name: Roasted Mushroom Salad
author: Ben S.
summary: Don't expect conventional nutrients from mushrooms, but they have hidden anti-cancer activity and may stimulate immune function, research finds. Add red pepper's vitamin C, olive oil's good fat, and the antioxidants in basil and garlic for a very healthful salad.
ingredients: 1 pound white button mushrooms, halved or quartered
¾ cup finely chopped red bell pepper
½ cup fresh basil or mint leaves, torn
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar or lemon juice
directions: Spread on large baking sheet and bake 15 minutes
In a bowl, combine mushrooms, red pepper, basil or mint, and pine nuts
Whisk together dressing ingredients; toss into mushroom mixture
Place lettuce on 4 salad plates and spoon mushroom mixture on top
